activities.name: Introduction to Syllables Video
activities.description: In this lesson, you will learn what a syllable is and how to count syllables in words. You will also get an introduction to the six syllable types.

activities.name: Play the Syllable Counting Game
activities.description: Play the Syllable Counting Game.

activities.name: Closed Syllables Video, Part 1/2
activities.description: In this lesson, you will learn the definition of a closed syllable and write down some examples of closed syllable words.

activities.name: Closed Syllables Video, Part 2/2
activities.description: In this lesson, you will continue to learn about closed syllables.

activities.name: Practice reading phonograms and words
activities.description: Use pages 14-15 of the linked printable to recite some phonogram sounds as well as read some words with closed syllables.

activities.name: Find closed syllable words in "Aesop's Fables in Words of One Syllable"
activities.description: Find closed syllable words in "Aesop's Fables in Words of One Syllable".

activities.name: Find closed syllable words in "Swiss Family Robinson in Words of One Syllable"
activities.description: Find closed syllable words in "Swiss Family Robinson in Words of One Syllable".

activities.name: Open Syllables Video, Part 1/2
activities.description: In this lesson, you will learn the definition of an open syllable and write down some examples of open syllable words.

activities.name: Open Syllables Video, Part 2/2
activities.description: In this lesson, you will continue to learn about open syllables.

activities.name: Practice reading phonograms and words

activities.name: Find all the open syllable words in three poems
activities.description: Find the open syllable words in three poems from "The Children's First Book of Poetry".

activities.name: Consonant le Syllables Video, Part 1/2
activities.description: In this lesson, you will learn the definition of the consonant le syllable, write down some examples of this syllable type, and write some words that contain this syllable type.

activities.name: Consonant le Syllables Video, Part 2/2
activities.description: In this lesson, you will continue to learn about consonant le syllables.

activities.name: Practice reading phonograms and words
activities.description: Use pages 14-15 of the linked printable to recite some phonogram sounds as well as read some words with closed, open, and consonant le syllables.

activities.name: Find five consonant le syllables in the linked file
activities.description: Find five consonant le syllables in the linked file.

activities.name: R-Controlled Syllables Video, Part 1/2
activities.description: In this lesson, you will learn the definition of the r-controlled syllable and write some words that contain this type of syllable.

activities.name: R-Controlled Syllables Video, Part 2/2
activities.description: In this lesson, you will continue to learn about r-controlled syllables.

activities.name: Practice reading phonograms and words
activities.description: Use pages 14-16 of the linked printable to recite some phonogram sounds as well as read some words with closed, open, consonant le, and r-controlled syllables.

activities.name: Find 19 words with an r-controlled syllable type in the linked file
activities.description: Find 19 words with an r-controlled syllable type in the linked file.

activities.name: Vowel-Consonant-E Syllables Video, Part 1/2
activities.description: In this lesson, you will learn the definition of the vowel-consonant-e syllable, also known as the vce or magic e syllable, and write some words that contain this type of syllable.

activities.name: Vowel-Consonant-E Syllables Video, Part 2/2
activities.description: In this lesson, you will continue to learn about vowel-consonant-e syllables.

activities.name: Practice reading phonograms and words
activities.description: Use pages 14-16 of the linked printable to recite some phonogram sounds as well as read some words with closed, open, consonant le, r-controlled, and vowel-consonant-e syllables.

activities.name: Vowel Team Syllables Video, Part 2/2

activities.name: Review Lesson of Syllables Video, Part 1/2

activities.name: Review Lesson of Syllables Video, Part 2/2

activities.name: With help, find and study two syllable words in "The Velveteen Rabbit"
activities.description: With help, use the book "The Velveteen Rabbit" to find ten two-syllable words. Write them down and find the syllable break in each of the ten words. Then, examine each of the twenty resulting syllables and determine the syllable type for each syllable.
